basics.name: Yixin Ou (欧翌昕)
basics.label: CS Master Student
basics.summary: An AI researcher interested in Large Language Models and their theory and applications.

work.name: YiWise
work.summary: Research the few-shot prompt-learning capabilities of pretrained language models and take part in the Real-world Annotated Few-shot Tasks competition, achieving second place on the leaderboard.

work.name: AIWaves Inc. (acquired by OPPO AI Center)
work.summary: Research data-centric, self-evolving LLM agents, develop and open-source an agent reasoning and optimization framework, and surpass 5.6k GitHub stars.

work.name: Huawei Noah's Ark Lab
work.summary: Study Mechanistic Interpretability techniques for LLMs, investigate new knowledge acquisition mechanisms, and perform interpretability analysis of Continual Pre-training from a Knowledge Circuit perspective.
